version_description:
New: We’ve added Touch ID as an option for logging into the app. Your phone has to be Touch ID enabled and you need to have the feature turned on.
New: Forget your password? No problem. We’ve improved that flow making it much smoother for you to reset.
Fixed: We had some issues with new customers using our Keep me Logged in feature. We’ve fixed that bug and you will stay logged in when that option is selected.

New: We’ve added Touch ID as an option for logging into the app. Your phone has to be Touch ID enabled and you need to have the feature turned on.
New: Forget your password? No problem. We’ve improved that flow making it much smoother for you to reset.
Fixed: We had some issues with new customers using our Keep me Logged in feature. We’ve fixed that bug and you will stay logged in when that option is selected.
New: Minor bug fixes and upgrades
New: Minor bug fixes and upgrades
- New: Minor updates and bug fixes
- New: Minor updates and bug fixes
-Minor bug fixes and updates
-Minor bug fixes and updates

NEW

• Added the ability to link directly to a promo that you received via an app push notification, so that you do not have to manually enter the promo and you can quickly build and place your order.

ENHANCEMENTS

• Pizza crust option experience.
• Customizing deals experience.

NEW

• Added the ability to link directly to a promo that you received via an app push notification, so that you do not have to manually enter the promo and you can quickly build and place your order.

ENHANCEMENTS

• Pizza crust option experience.
• Customizing deals experience.

New
We're auto-populating addresses now! Quickly enter or edit a delivery address with address autocomplete.

Enhancements
Ordering for a specific date or time? We've updated future ordering to make planning ahead a breeze!

New
We're auto-populating addresses now! Quickly enter or edit a delivery address with address autocomplete.

Enhancements
Ordering for a specific date or time? We've updated future ordering to make planning ahead a breeze!

• Build your custom deal even faster with our redesigned Deal Builder! Our developers ate a lot of pizza and cheesesticks to make sure they got this update just right.
• Little design changes because every tweak gets us thismuchcloser to the perfect app for you.

- Keep your eye on the price - your order tracking & details link is on the order confirmation screen under the Papa Track tab. It’ll take you from the order confirmation screen directly to past orders.
- Need to find that pizza you loved? Check the Menu screen for your most recent past order.
- Tidied up checkout navigation.
- Improvements to Face and Touch ID so you can log in even easier.
Bug Fixes

- Bug fixes for App crashes.
- Improvements to predictive search.

- Papa Size for deals:
Realize you wanted a bigger pizza for deals than what you ordered?
It happened for a few dollars more you can "Papa Size" your pizza to the next size up during checkout(at participating stores).
- Experience Enhancements:
Now you can experience our app when clicking on any promotional links sent through SMS & Gmail.
- Minor bug fixes
-For some customers the future ordering desired time was not quite right. We fixed that bug so you get tasty pizza at the right time.

-We've done some more tweaking so you can get your pizza ordering done faster
-Fixed a bug that was causing some of you to crash while managing your account

Papa Size:
Realize you wanted a bigger pizza than what you ordered?
It happens for a few dollars more you can “Papa Size” your pizza to the next size up during checkout(at participating stores).

MLB Experience:
Get game time reminders and a countdown clock for your favorite Major League Baseball team.

Canadian Credit Cards:
We now accept and process credit cards for online pizza orders in Canada.

Save Your Favorite:
Everyone has a favorite pizza, and now we’ve made it even easier to save and order yours.

Bug Fixes

• Build your custom deal even faster with our redesigned Deal Builder! Our developers ate a lot of pizza and cheesesticks to make sure they got this update just right.
• Little design changes because every tweak gets us thismuchcloser to the perfect app for you.

• Build your custom deal even faster with our redesigned Deal Builder! Our developers ate a lot of pizza and cheesesticks to make sure they got this update just right.
• Little design changes because every tweak gets us thismuchcloser to the perfect app for you.

• Ordering just got easier - skip customizing to add items directly to your cart, pile on the extra cheese, and do it all with better accessibility.
• Top up your toppings with new tabs, improved placement, and a counter to help you keep track of what's on your pizza.
• Design changes to make the app even better.

- Flexible Papa Dough - No more all-or-nothing. Now you can choose how much Papa Dough you want to use towards your order.
- Suggested quick-tips (15%, 20% or 25%) make tipping your driver even easier - no math required.
- Design changes to make the app even better.
- Bug fixes

Enhancements to improve your ordering experience
Enhancements to improve your ordering experience
Minor enhancements to improve your experience
Minor enhancements to improve your experience

- Improved login makes it easier to sign in, update or reset your password, and opt in to (or out of) email offers/alerts.
- Streamlined account creation simplifies sign up so you can start earning Papa Rewards faster.
- No more missed points - now you can sign up for Papa Rewards at checkout.
- Easily find your store – Seamlessly switch between delivery/carryout, find nearby stores, and choose between saved and primary addresses.
- Check the new Rewards tab to view your points and make sure you don’t miss out on any Papa Dough.
- New loading & welcome screens bring you a better experience and updated images (now with extra garlic sauce).

- New loading & welcome screens bring you a better experience and updated images (now with extra garlic sauce).

We've added some brand new features like:
- Dark Mode
- Personalized App Icon selection
- Updated account section, with better navigation
- Improved menu navigation, with better ways to explore our newest additions
- Added a "Recently Viewed" section for easily jumping back to those items or deals
... and fixed some bugs too
